review: Plugged this into our TV and we haven't stopped casting videos and audio files since.  Love that you can cast a video to the device and it will turn on your TV for you.  I ended up moving this to an open HDMI plug in my entertainment/Blue Ray player (Sony) so that we can enjoy the 5.1 audio as well as the video.  It works with the entertainment system to turn it on, switch to the correct video port, and turn the TV (Sony) on as well for a seamless integration.  We primarily use it to watch YouTube videos or listen to Pandora stations and drive the device from our smartphones (Samsung and Apple devices).  We even tend to leave it on when nothing is casting because the photos that Google displays when it is inactive are stunning.
